biography: More gifs, puns & hashtags, all in 280 characters 💚 #MoreReasons
description: We’ve been shocked and saddened watching events unfold in Ukraine and want to help. We’re donating £250,000 to the Disasters Emergency Committee (DEC) Ukraine Appeal.

biography: More gifs, puns & hashtags, all in 280 characters 💚 #MoreReasons
description: To say thank you to our nation's teachers, from Monday our 10% Teacher discount will include all employed staff at nurseries and colleges. T&Cs apply. Valid photo ID required. Includes all school employed staff who work with children under 18. See https://t.co/fHRvQqJSKc
name: Morrisons

biography: More gifs, puns & hashtags, all in 280 characters 💚 #MoreReasons
description:
To help fight holiday hunger we are donating 15,000 lunchboxes every day.  Colleagues in our stores will distribute lunchboxes to food banks and schools in their local communities so they can get them to school children in need. 
#fightholidayhunger #fooddonation #donate
name: Morrisons

description: We've announced a new pay deal that'll see all 98,596 frontline store colleagues receive at least £10 an hour from April this year. For more info - https://t.co/fmQezUJmmK

name: Morrisons

biography: More gifs, puns & hashtags, all in 280 characters 💚 #MoreReasons
description:
We’re removing plastic carrier bags from our stores! That equates to 3,200 tonnes of plastic removed per year. You can instead buy our reusable paper carrier bags, which can hold up to 16 kg of shopping, plus they’re recyclable and water resistant.

#ReduceReuseRecycle
name: Morrisons

biography: More gifs, puns & hashtags, all in 280 characters 💚 #MoreReasons
description:
A message to British Farmers: Back in 2017, we pledged to support British farmers by selling only British fresh meat.  Five years on, we're happy to reaffirm that commitment. 100%. 
@BBCNews @FarmersGuardian @Minette_Batters
name: Morrisons

biography: More gifs, puns & hashtags, all in 280 characters 💚 #MoreReasons

biography: More gifs, puns & hashtags, all in 280 characters 💚 #MoreReasons
description: This Half Term, we're donating over 60,000 free Homemade Pizza Kits from our stores to support hunger across the holidays. The kits feature everything kids’ll need to make their own pizza and will be donated to local schools and community groups to pass on to families in need.

description:

#letsendperiodpoverty

description: Our new Kids Meal Packs are £12.50 and contain breakfast, lunch and snacks for up to 7 days. If you have children in your school isolating, who receive free school meals, we'll deliver the packs directly to their home. Schools can email: schoolbox@morrisonsplc.co.uk for info.

description: We at Morrisons want to say thank you to our National Health Service so we will offer a 10% discount on NHS workers' shopping. Show a valid NHS photo ID card at the checkout and we will deduct 10% off your shopping basket. This will run from Thursday 16th April for 3 months.
name: Morrisons

#FeedingTheNation #ItsMoreThanOurJob #Baking #Flour

biography: More gifs, puns & hashtags, all in 280 characters 💚 #MoreReasons
description: Thank you to our incredible colleagues, working so very hard to feed the nation. They'll receive a guaranteed bonus of 6% of their earnings for the next 12 months. Permanent and temporary colleagues, and those off sick or self-isolating, will be eligible. #ItsMoreThanOurJob
name: Morrisons

description:

Ts&Cs apply. Valid school photo ID required. See https://t.co/fHRvQqJSKc for details.
name: Morrisons
